statements: SELECT * FROM BatteryStorage;
SELECT battery_id, storage_location FROM BatteryStorage;
SELECT capacity, performance_rating FROM BatteryStorage WHERE performance_rating > 4.5;
SELECT * FROM BatteryStorage WHERE last_maintenance_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM BatteryStorage ORDER BY storage_location ASC, battery_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM BatteryStorage WHERE capacity > 1000 ORDER BY last_maintenance_date DESC
SELECT battery_id, storage_location FROM BatteryStorage WHERE capacity < 5000
SELECT * FROM BatteryStorage WHERE performance_rating >= 4.5 AND storage_location LIKE '%East%'
SELECT storage_location, performance_rating FROM BatteryStorage WHERE last_maintenance_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY capacity DESC
SELECT battery_id, capacity, last_maintenance_date FROM BatteryStorage WHERE performance_rating < 3 OR storage_location = 'Warehouse A'
SELECT id, location, capacity, voltage FROM battery_storage;
SELECT location, id, capacity, voltage FROM battery_storage WHERE capacity > 100;
SELECT * FROM battery_storage WHERE location LIKE '%warehouse%';
SELECT id, location FROM battery_storage WHERE voltage > 300;
SELECT id, location, capacity FROM battery_storage ORDER BY capacity DESC;
SELECT * FROM battery_storage WHERE capacity > 100 ORDER BY location DESC
SELECT location, capacity, voltage FROM battery_storage WHERE capacity < 50 ORDER BY capacity ASC
SELECT * FROM battery_storage WHERE location LIKE '%north%' ORDER BY capacity DESC
SELECT DISTINCT location FROM battery_storage ORDER BY location ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT location, SUM(capacity) AS total_capacity FROM battery_storage GROUP BY location HAVING total_capacity > 500 ORDER BY total_capacity DESC
SELECT * FROM battery_data LIMIT 10
SELECT id, battery_id, battery_level FROM battery_data WHERE battery_temperature > 30
SELECT timestamp, battery_temperature FROM battery_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT id, location FROM charging_station WHERE max_power > 200
SELECT * FROM energy_usage WHERE energy_consumed BETWEEN 5 AND 10
SELECT * FROM battery_data WHERE battery_level > 50 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT battery_id, battery_level, battery_temperature FROM battery_data WHERE battery_temperature < 25 AND battery_level < 80 ORDER BY battery_level ASC
SELECT b.timestamp, e.energy_consumed FROM battery_data b INNER JOIN energy_usage e ON b.battery_id = e.battery_id WHERE e.energy_consumed > 100 ORDER BY b.timestamp DESC
SELECT c.location, c.max_power, e.energy_consumed FROM charging_station c INNER JOIN energy_usage e ON c.id = e.charging_station_id WHERE c.max_power >= 50 ORDER BY e.energy_consumed DESC
SELECT battery_id, battery_level, battery_temperature FROM battery_data WHERE battery_temperature BETWEEN 20 AND 30 AND battery_level > 70 ORDER BY battery_id ASC
SELECT * FROM BatteryStorage WHERE capacity > 100
SELECT id, location FROM BatteryStorage WHERE state_of_charge < 50
SELECT location, capacity FROM BatteryStorage ORDER BY location DESC
SELECT * FROM EnergyProduction WHERE production_amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000
SELECT date, consumption_region FROM EnergyConsumption WHERE date = '2022-01-15'
SELECT * FROM BatteryStorage WHERE capacity > 100 ORDER BY state_of_charge ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT location, capacity FROM BatteryStorage WHERE location LIKE 'C%'
SELECT SUM(production_amount) AS total_production FROM EnergyProduction WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT AVG(discharge_rate) AS avg_discharge_rate FROM BatteryPerformance GROUP BY battery_id HAVING AVG(discharge_rate) > 0.5
SELECT date, consumption_region, consumption_amount FROM EnergyConsumption WHERE consumption_amount > 500 ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT * FROM energy_production;
SELECT battery_id, date, performance_metric, value FROM battery_performance WHERE battery_id = '12345';
SELECT production_id, date, production_value FROM energy_production ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT * FROM battery_storage WHERE capacity > 1000;
SELECT location, capacity, efficiency FROM battery_storage WHERE efficiency > 0.9;
SELECT * FROM battery_storage WHERE location='New York';
SELECT battery_id, capacity, efficiency FROM battery_storage WHERE capacity > 1000;
SELECT battery_id, location FROM battery_storage WHERE efficiency > 0.8 ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT * FROM battery_performance WHERE performance_metric='Temperature';
SELECT battery_id, date, value FROM battery_performance WHERE value < 50 ORDER BY date ASC;
